title: Is the Steph Curry Discourse Getting Out of Hand? | Real Ones
description:
Logan and Raja start off by getting into the flopping and dirty fouls of Raja’s past (1:00), then discuss the over-the-top Steph Curry discourse following the Warriors’ abysmal start and Steph’s 62-point career-high performance (9:40), as well as the lengthened injury-recovery period that has produced explosive play from John Wall and Kevin Durant (25:47). 
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
